name: Neisis
description:
⚔️Neisis is an immersive medieval and magic MMORPG⚔️

will You Support Ogres Or Humans ?

You will decide, become an archer 🏹, a warrior 🗡️or a wizard 🔮and dive into the vast world of Neisis.

🛡️Found your guild and play with friends, create together giant buildings.

📜 Discover the story of Neisis with the various quests. Progress, upgrading your stuff.

Join Our Official Discord : Discord.gg/neisis
